analysis.description:
ExternalView.totalInfo (/unique_chucks/6/0x6bba97fa60ed6339ca583b8b40c2fd0c12284c2f.sol#365-379) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (startTime > 0,block.timestamp >= endTime,addressOfCaptain,totalPot,endTime,sharesOfScheme(MAIN_SCHEME),valueOfScheme(MAIN_SCHEME),maxTime,addedTime,addressOfOwner) (/unique_chucks/6/0x6bba97fa60ed6339ca583b8b40c2fd0c12284c2f.sol#371-379)

WinnerWinner.start (/unique_chucks/6/0x6bba97fa60ed6339ca583b8b40c2fd0c12284c2f.sol#448-458) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(startTime == 0) (/unique_chucks/6/0x6bba97fa60ed6339ca583b8b40c2fd0c12284c2f.sol#449)

WinnerWinner.buy (/unique_chucks/6/0x6bba97fa60ed6339ca583b8b40c2fd0c12284c2f.sol#459-513) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- endTime.add(goldenTickets.mul(addedTime)) > block.timestamp.add(maxTime) (/unique_chucks/6/0x6bba97fa60ed6339ca583b8b40c2fd0c12284c2f.sol#500-506)

WinnerWinner.registerCode (/unique_chucks/6/0x6bba97fa60ed6339ca583b8b40c2fd0c12284c2f.sol#521-528) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(startTime > 0) (/unique_chucks/6/0x6bba97fa60ed6339ca583b8b40c2fd0c12284c2f.sol#522)

WinnerWinner.withdrawPot (/unique_chucks/6/0x6bba97fa60ed6339ca583b8b40c2fd0c12284c2f.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(startTime > 0) (/unique_chucks/6/0x6bba97fa60ed6339ca583b8b40c2fd0c12284c2f.sol)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > (endTime + 600)) (/unique_chucks/6/0x6bba97fa60ed6339ca583b8b40c2fd0c12284c2f.sol)
